name: Mamoswine

attacks.name: Ancient Power
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. If all of them are heads, this attack does 30 more damage, and remove 2 damage counters from Mamoswine.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Deal 10 damage to all Benched Pokemon that are not Ground Type. Apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.

flavor: A frozen Mamoswine was unearthed in the Arctic after 10,000 years. There is debate on whether early humans hunted these Pokemon to extinction. This Pokemon is prehistoric!
